metadata.title: CVE-2024-29415 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The ip package through 2.0.1 for Node.js might allow SSRF because some IPaddresses (such as 127.1, 01200034567, 012.1.2.3, 000:0:0000::01, and::fFFf:127.0.0.1) are improperly categorized as globally routable viaisPublic. NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix forCVE-2023-42282.

criterions.comment: node-ip package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
